data.eml:eml: A new African Apiocera species (Apioceridae, Diptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sergei J. Paramonov (1950): A new African Apiocera species (Apioceridae, Diptera). Journal of the Entomological Society of Southern Africa 13: 103-105, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.16341
